page.title: Current Account
page.tab:
A Hong Leong Current Account is designed for customers who would like a high number of regular transactions with the bank. This includes deposits and withdrawals, and allows payments to creditors by using cheques.

Key Features and benefits:

  • Two currencies are available in USD and KHR.
  • Easy access at ATMs 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
  • Get your ATM card immediately
  • Free monthly account statement
  • Allows you to make payment through cheques
  • Unlimited number of transaction withdrawals via ATM or over the counter.

Eligibility:

  • Customer need to be 18 years old or above
  • Minimum initial Deposit is USD 500
  • Minimum balance requirement is USD 10
  • This account is available to individual, non-individual, or joint account holders.

Document requirements for account opening:

  • Primary document:
    • Cambodia National Identification Card; or
    • Passport
  • Any two of the below secondary documents in case the primary document is not available:
    • Birth certificate
    • Resident book
    • Marriage certificate
    • Residential Certificate by an official authority
    • Family book with photo of head of family
    • Driving license issued by an official authority

One of the above secondary documents must have a holderâ€™s photograph e.g driving license and Birth certificate.
Please contact our staff for document requirements for non-individual account opening.
